item.title: Test-time Computing: from System-1 Thinking to System-2 Thinking
item.description: Unlocking LLM potential: This paper surveys test-time computing, showing how it boosts reasoning abilities by shifting from reactive System-1 to deliberate System-2 thinking, paving the way for more p…
